extracted_playbook.condition: Which deployment type is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Updated Version for On-premise Deployments
extracted_playbook.description: On-premise users should install the updated version immediately. Updated versions are available for 15.x (15.8.9 available January 28, 2025) and Cityworks 23.x (23.10 available January 29, 2025).

extracted_playbook.title: Review IIS Identity Permissions
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure IIS is not run with local or domain level administrative privileges. Refer to the latest release notes in the Cityworks Support Portal for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Attachment Directory
extracted_playbook.description: Limit attachment directory root configuration to folders/subfolders which only contain attachments. Refer to the latest release notes in the Cityworks Support Portal for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Verify Automatic Updates for CWOL Deployments
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the updates are automatically applied to all Cityworks Online (CWOL) deployments.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS Assets
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets. Refer to CISA's ICS webpage for guidance.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA's guidance on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
